title.narrative: Equality and Capacity Development in Housing Cooperatives (PECH-HC)

description.narrative: Intensified mobilisation and sensitisation on Housing Cooperatives in the existing affiliates that has seen the number of active members increase from 1,064 in December 2017 to 1,145 by June 2018. Intensified mobilisation and sensitisation activities in the rural areas, including Gulu and Bundibugyo districts where meetings were held at the respective districts and within the community with existing organised groups. Also, one talk show was held in Bundibugyo, and interviews with media houses held in both districts resulting in two (2) housing cooperatives being registered. A total of two (2) housing cooperatives registered with UHOCU during the reporting period, for Ministry of Lands, Housing and Urban Development staff housing cooperatives and Nkokonjeru-tuzimbe housing cooperatives. Four (4) women representatives from four housing cooperatives namely Kidokolo-twezimbe, Mama-papa, Makindye-galima and Nkokonjeru-tuzimbe participated in the Leadership for Change Arena 1 training at the Uganda Cooperative College-Kigumba. Research on Rural housing lead to the development of Prototype housing plans for Rural housing cooperatives. In order to increase access to land and adequate housing by women, men and young people through housing cooperatives, 2 Primary Housing Cooperative Societies (Kiwatule BAkozi and Wakiso Destiny) acquired 2 and 5.45 acres of land respectively. Through access to financial services Kidokolo Twezimbe housing Cooperative has fully paid for 3 acres land in Buikwe district. A rural housing Cooperative by name of Awach Improved Housing Cooperative, located in Awach Sub-County in Gulu district, was registered and inaugurated. Members' savings for housing increased from UGX 113,466,558 to UGX179,474,105.
To improve quality of life for women, men and young people through increased access to sustainable adequate housing by 2022

activity-date.narrative: Planned end date of the activity
Planned start date of the activity
